title: Pest control operator licenses
dataVerified: Licensee name, business name, license categories, insurance, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: License status (active/expired/revoked). Link to state department of agriculture system (customers and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents unlicensed pest control. Domain binding verifies state department of agriculture. Pesticide application compliance. Consumer protection. Liability insurance verification.
